rev.desc.rev.desc: changed error exit on exit.error.msg from non-existent exit.error to $error

Added a new exit parameter (label="Cancel:" and value parm="$REOPEN.CANCEL"). Also added the value of this new parm ("$REOPEN.CANCEL") to the "Cancel Exit:" parm on the spawn.edit call panel (calls apm.edit.problem).
Modifed exit due to changes to the paramater panel of apm.save.problem. (Had to add two new exits due to error found on IM00088 in the betat when testing SCD.)
Used fduplicate() instead on contents() to populate the buffer.

descript.descript: changed error exit on exit.error.msg from non-existent exit.error to $error

Added a new exit parameter (label="Cancel:" and value parm="$REOPEN.CANCEL"). Also added the value of this new parm ("$REOPEN.CANCEL") to the "Cancel Exit:" parm on the spawn.edit call panel (calls apm.edit.problem).
Modifed exit due to changes to the paramater panel of apm.save.problem. (Had to add two new exits due to error found on IM00088 in the betat when testing SCD.)
Used fduplicate() instead on contents() to populate the buffer.
